comment: A deduction unionizing a non-unionized collection of virtual hypotheses. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 3-Dec-2015.) Proof was revised to accommodate a possible future version of ~ df-tru . (Revised by David A. Wheeler, 8-May-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
